<div data-content="N1016E" class="MMM--tabSection clearfix 2">
<div style="font-size:24px" class="MMM--hdg MMM--hdg_2 SNAPS--hdg_2 MMM--tabHeader MMM--toggle_trggr">Details<i class="MMM--icn  MMM--icn_arrowUp SNAPS--toggle_icon"></i>
</div>
<div class="tabContentContainer MMM--contentToggle-target">
<div class="MMM--contentPadded MMM--accordionPanel">
<div class="MMM--grids">
<div class="MMM--grids-col MMM--grids-col_pdpMain">
<ul class="MMM--pdpList SNAPS--bullets">
<li>1.5 x 3 inch dry sponge can be used with a wide range buffers and enrichment media and in dry-only environments</li>
<li>Simplified packaging convenience minimizes handling and preparation and reduces waste</li>
<li>Biocide-free sponge does not affect organism viability</li>
<li>5 x 9 inch printable sample bag with 18 oz./0.53 L capacity for safe, convenient transportation to lab</li>
<li>Decontaminated through gamma irradiation to maintain aseptic conditions</li>
</ul>
<p class="SNAPS--pdpTabDes">The 3M™ Dry-Sponge is a biocide-free cellulose sponge that comes with a printable sample bag.</p>
<p class="SNAPS--pdpTabDes">The 3M™ Dry-Sponge is made from cellulose, an ideal sampling material for monitoring for the presence of food-borne pathogens that meets specifications for sample collection of the Rules and Regulations of the Federal Register (Vol 61, No. 144, 1996). The durable sponge is biocide-free and will not affect organism viability. It is decontaminated through gamma irradiation to maintain aseptic conditions. As a dry sponge, this product can be used with any number of in-house or pre-mixed buffers and sampling solutions to meet the testing needs at the time the sample is taken. It is suitable for use in dry-only facilities where dry sampling is required. The cellulose material is effective for capturing particulates in dry sampling scenarios. The sponge also comes with a 3M™ Sample Bag to hold it after sampling for safe, convenient transportation to the lab. The Hazard Analysis Critical Control Point (HACCP) approach is the most widely accepted food safety management protocol worldwide. Sample collection products from 3M are a crucial part of this approach to identify potential food-borne hazards and pinpoint where they reside. Portability, stable enrichment media, and easy-to-handle swabs and sponges are designed to test for a wide variety of potential hazards and deliver exceptionally accurate results. They are engineered to safely gather, hold, and secure contents from the collection site to the lab without leaking or compromising the sample.</p>
<p class="SNAPS--pdpTabDes"></p>
<h4 class="MMM--hdg MMM--pdpTabVr SNAPS--pdpTabVr">Suggested Applications</h4>
<ul class="MMM--pdpList SNAPS--bullets">
<li>Dry sampling</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    loadPageModule('kungfu/EmailForm/EmailOptions');

    domReady.updateLinks = function() {
        var tabText = "",
            tabLink = "",
            wtb_link = "";

        if (window.location.href.indexOf("fr_CA") > -1) {
            tabText = "Contactez un rep";
            tabLink = "#repForm";
            wtb_link = "/3M/en_CA/food-safety-testing-ca/where-to-buy/";
        } else {
            tabText = "Contact a representative";
            tabLink = "#repForm";
            wtb_link = "/3M/en_CA/food-safety-testing-ca/where-to-buy/";
        }

        $('.SNAPS--options_more').append('<a class="contactRepBtn SNAPS--activeBtn" id="contactRep" href="' + tabLink + '">' + tabText + '</a>');

        $('a[data-wt="where_to_buy_button"]').each(function() {
            var a_href = $(this).attr('href');
            this.href = this.href.replace(a_href, wtb_link);

        });

        $(document).ajaxComplete(function() {
            $('a[data-wt="where_to_buy_button"]').each(function() {
                var a_href = $(this).attr('href');
                this.href = this.href.replace(a_href, wtb_link);
            });
            $('a[data-wt="where_to_buy_button"]').css("display","inline-block");
        });

        $('#contactRep').click(function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            $('.MMM--tabHeader:contains("' + tabText + '")').trigger('click').next().addClass('MMM--isActive');
            $('html, body').animate({
                scrollTop: ($('#repForm').offset().top - 300)
            }, 500);
        });   
    }
</script>
